metadata.name: Beg Or Cheat
metadata.description:
In June 2018, in Saint Peter's Square, in the Vatican, there were thousands and thousands of people, many of whom were nuns, priests, Christians and of course tourists. After observing for a while, I began to see this individual praying on his knees in the street, begging for alms, as if it were his last day on earth. After a while, without taking my eyes off him, because it was quite impressive, I saw how he got up and went to a corner, where to my surprise there were two other individuals dressed like him, next to a priest, who seemed to be giving them instructions on how to act, a few seconds later, they separate, each one for his place and continue with the plan. That was just the moment when I decided to take the photo and immortalize it, to remind myself that appearances can be deceiving, so "Beg or Cheat", that is the question, what do you think?
Resolution 5184x3456
Location 41°54'06.7"N 12°27'30.5"E
Date 28-06-2018, 11:06
1/1 Series
